name.jp: ジャイアント・ブウ召喚のオーブ

description.en: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.br: Irá invocar um Boo Gigante. Para usar, clique vezes no item e depois clique no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能召唤终极魔花兽的魔法晶球
description.fi: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un Géant Boo pour une heure. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Memungkinkan Anda memanggil Giant Boo. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah terdekat untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.jp: ジャイアント・ブウを召喚する魔法のオーブ。使用してから召喚したい地面をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 거대 부우를 소환 하는 마법 구슬. 사용하려면 두 번 클릭한 다음 자이언트를 호출할 영역을 선택합니다.
description.nl: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Шар призыва громадной задушицы. Дважды щелкните по шару, а затем укажите место на земле, где должен появиться монстр.
description.sp: Te permite invocar al Boo Gigante. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Allows you to summon a Giant Boo. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.th: อนุญาตให้คุณอัญเชิญ Giant Boo ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่ที่อยู่ใกล้เคียงเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能召喚終極魔花獸的魔法晶球。要使用，請雙點擊它，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Cho phép bạn triệu hồi Boo khổng lồ. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất gần đó để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
